Tap here to get started!: Tlanya mona bakeng sa ho qala!
You can choose whether you want to add i: O ka kgetha hore ebe o batla ho kenya lekeno kapa ditjeho ho setatemente sa lekeno la hao
Let's go through one example! Tap income: Ha re shebeng mohlala o le mong! Tlanya lekeno
See a list of income types. For income t: Sheba lenane la mefuta ya lekeno. Bakeng sa lekeno le seng lenaneng lena, o ka kgetha 'E nngwe'
Let's pretend you received a donation to: Ha re etseng eka o fumana monehelo kajeno, kobola mona!
You will need to fill in all the info on: O tla tlameha ho tlatsa tlhahisoleseding yohle sekirineng sena
I've filled in an example for you! Now t: Ke o tlatseding mohlala! Jwale tlanya 'Save'(Boloka)
Great! Your income has now been added to: Ke hantle! Lekeno la hao jwale le se le kentswe ho setatemente sa kakaretso ya lekeno ho thebo ya tjhelete
You can see, change, or download you sta: O ka bona, wa fetola, kapa wa daonlouda setatemente sa hao ka ho kobola konopo ena.
Great job, you're ready to start!: Ke hantle! Lekeno la hao jwale le kentswe ho setatemente sa lekeno ka kakaretso ho thebo ya tjhelete.
